comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content:
perfgeek:

Thanks for your comment!  Actually, the platform the locomotive is sitting on is known as a transfer table (sometimes a traverse table or traverser).  It is a platform on wheels sometimes used to shift locomotives or train cars from one track to another.

We hope you continue to enjoy the collection!
